purpose: Enhanced experience data for portfolio website

personal.name: Jonathan Gray
personal.headline: DevOps / SRE in London . Systems Development Engineer at AWS

summary: With up to four years at AWS, 6 years experience as an SRE and previously a DevOps Engineer and 10 years experience total in the IT sector I have honed my expertise in Linux systems, infrastructure monitoring, and incident response. My passion is to enable operational efficiency and enhance service reliability by implementing scalable solutions. I am motivated by opportunities to collaborate on high-impact projects and constantly learn and improve on my skillset in this fast and ever changing world.

roles.title: Systems Development Engineer
roles.location: City of London, England, United Kingdom

roles.title: Linux Systems Engineer
roles.location: City of London, England, United Kingdom
roles.description: Systems Engineer within the Route53 Healthcheck team. The Route53 Healthcheck service is a highly available endpoint monitoring global service with 100% uptime.
highlights: Oncall roster - responded to alerts, triaged events and troubleshooting/deep diving into issues
Improvements and high severity issue reduction
Region Builds - Building regions using existing AWS and in-house tooling while working on Automation tasks to reduce human intervention and drive overall build time down
Top-down security campaigns - these required code changes/patches and following through deployments to all Healthcheck services in multiple regions/AZs

roles.title: Site Reliability Engineer
roles.description: Part of the TechOps team, working in a multi-DC redundant multi-region infrastructure with thousands of servers globally. Daily tasks are a mix between fire fighting, dealing with monitoring alerts, escalations from other teams and project based work. Also partake in the OnCall roster which responds to late night alerts, needed to ensure 24/7 uptime of core services and applications.
highlights: 24/7 uptime of core services and applications

roles.title: DevOps Engineer
roles.description: Working with the FICO CCS UK Operations team to maintain, automate and further improve its vast infrastructure, which is responsible for informing customers of banks about potential fraudulent behaviour.

roles.title: Associate Technical Support Engineer
roles.description: Communicating with customers via phone calls, emails and support tickets. Troubleshooting complex issues. Sometimes identifying bugs, replicating them and liaising with Dev via JIRA to find workarounds or get a code fix in place.
highlights: Customer communication via phone, email, and tickets
Developer liaison for workarounds and fixes

roles.title: Technical Support Engineer
roles.description: Technical troubleshooting for end users, 1st & 2nd line issues.

roles.title: IT Support Analyst
roles.description: Temporary 3 month contract giving IT Support to end users over the phone and remote assistance.

experience.company: Phoenix IT Group (now part of Daisy Group)

websiteIntegration.note: AWS has multiple roles - consider showing as a single company entry with role progression
